full_summary:
## Tender Notice
### Title:
Reception, Monitoring, Security and Maintenance Services at Baie de L'Isle-Verte National Wildlife Area (2023-2025)

### Contract Details

*   **Contract Number:** 5000072959
*   **Publication Date:** May 17, 2023
*   **Closing Date:** June 2, 2023, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
*   **Contract Period:** June 9, 2023, to March 31, 2025

### Objectives
Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires a Contractor to provide services for the ongoing operations of the Baie de L'Isle-Verte National Wildlife Area (BIV NWA) and adjacent lands managed by ECCC. This includes:

*   Visitor reception
*   Facility and land maintenance
*   Site monitoring
*   Public safety

### Services Required
The Contractor will be responsible for providing the following services:

*   Handyman services
*   Exterior grounds maintenance
*   Guide and interpreter services
*   Security guard services

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Angela Quan, at [Angela.Quan@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Angela.Quan@ec.gc.ca) or (438) 316-0406.

### Tender Documents
The tender documents are available for download from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5646/rfp-5000072959.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5646/rfp-5000072959.pdf).

### Contract Award
The contract will be awarded to the lowest bidder.

Note to reader: THIS TENDER ANNOUNCEMENT IS NOW EXPIRED AND IS NO LONGER ACCEPTING PROPOSALS. 
If you have any further requests, feel free to ask. I will be happy to provide a repaired version.  Have a great day!
